Subject: Megatron's rule
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron quickly inserts an interesting looking disk into his head before
closing the rest up. Megatron then sits up, rubing his head, he was finally
free of any control, even if Galvatron ever returned. His face curled into
a sneer, and he crushed the chip, "No one controls my cranial chamber" he
snareld, upset. He stood up, smiling at Astroblast's protection. He picked
up his fusion cannon, placing the large weapon on his arm, making him lookd
ungainly. "Astroblast, Stand down" Megatron commands. "Do you know this
robot Switchblade?" He asked.
